body.p: The Gentoo developer community has elected a new council, writes this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The PHP herd has found a way to let PHP4 and 5 coexist peacefully, and the Gentoo Forums policy of banning TOR users has been partly lifted. A little bit of everything is included in this week's issue, starting with a developer portrait, updates from the community at large, press clippings and a nice little trick to aid with kernel compilation, plus of course the Bugzilla statistics and security announcements from last week.
